welcome.title: Welcome to Tasks
welcome.text: The Tasks section helps you manage daily activities and recurring care tasks. Keep track of what needs to be done and coordinate with your care team.

adding.title: Adding Tasks
adding.text: Click the '+' button to add a new task. You can set a title, description, due date, and assign it to a team member.

recurring.title: Recurring Tasks
recurring.text: Set tasks to repeat daily, weekly, or monthly. Perfect for routine care activities that happen regularly.

completing.title: Completing Tasks
completing.text: Click the checkbox to mark a task as complete. Completed tasks are archived automatically after 24 hours.

step1.text: This is your task list. Tasks are organized by due date with overdue tasks highlighted.
step1.imageDescription: Task list overview showing pending and completed tasks

step2.text: Use the '+' button to add a new task quickly.

step3.text: Click any task to view details, edit, or mark it complete.
step3.imageDescription: Task detail view with edit options

tooltip.addTask: Add a new task to your list

welcome.title: Welcome to Care Notes
welcome.text: Care Notes help you document daily activities, observations, and important events. Create a comprehensive record of care provided.

logging.title: Logging Activities
logging.text: Record what activities were done, meals eaten, bathroom usage, and any incidents. Include as much detail as needed.

wellbeing.title: Tracking Wellbeing
wellbeing.text: Note the person's mood and general wellbeing. This helps track patterns over time.

reviewing.title: Reviewing Notes
reviewing.text: Browse through past notes to see care history. Use the archive to access older entries.

step1.text: View recent care notes here. Each note shows the activity, mood, and who logged it.
step1.imageDescription: Care notes list with recent entries

step2.text: Click 'Add Note' to create a new care log entry.

step3.text: Fill in the details about activities, meals, and observations.

welcome.title: Welcome to Scheduling
welcome.text: The Scheduling section shows your shifts, allows clock in/out, and helps manage shift changes and requests.

calendar.title: Calendar View
calendar.text: View your schedule in daily, weekly, or monthly format. See all team members' shifts at a glance.

clockInOut.title: Clock In/Out
clockInOut.text: Start and end your shifts with the clock in/out button. Your actual times are recorded for payroll.

requests.title: Shift Requests
requests.text: Request shift changes or time off. Admins will review and approve requests.

step1.text: The calendar shows all scheduled shifts. Your shifts are highlighted.

step2.text: Use the Clock In button when you arrive to start your shift.

step3.text: Request changes or view your timesheet from the menu.

welcome.title: Welcome to Diet Tracking
welcome.text: Track meals and food intake to monitor nutrition. Record what was eaten and how much was consumed.

logging.title: Logging Meals
logging.text: Add entries for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks. Include portion sizes and any notes.

photos.title: Adding Photos
photos.text: Take or upload photos of meals for visual documentation. Helpful for family members to see what's being eaten.

reviewing.title: Reviewing History
reviewing.text: View past entries to track eating patterns and ensure proper nutrition over time.

step1.text: Today's meals are shown here, organized by meal type.

step2.text: Tap to add a new meal entry with details and optional photo.

step3.text: Record portion eaten and any relevant notes.

welcome.title: Welcome to Medications
welcome.text: The Medication Administration Record (MAR) helps track medication schedules and confirm doses are given correctly.

schedule.title: Medication Schedule
schedule.text: See which medications are due and when. Overdue doses are highlighted for attention.

administering.title: Recording Administration
administering.text: When giving a medication, record it as given with the time. You can also record if a dose was refused or skipped.

history.title: Viewing History
history.text: Review past administration records for compliance and reporting purposes.

step1.text: Pending medications for today are shown here with their scheduled times.

step2.text: Click a medication to record it as given, refused, or skipped.

step3.text: Add notes if needed, especially for refused or skipped doses.

tooltip.addMedication: Add a new medication to the schedule

welcome.title: Welcome to Appointments
welcome.text: Keep track of medical appointments, therapy sessions, and other scheduled events in one place.

adding.title: Adding Appointments
adding.text: Create new appointments with date, time, location, and any relevant notes or preparation needed.

viewing.title: Viewing Upcoming
viewing.text: See all upcoming appointments at a glance. Past appointments are archived for reference.

step1.text: Upcoming appointments are listed here with date, time, and location.

step2.text: Click to add a new appointment with all the details.

step3.text: Edit or delete appointments as plans change.

welcome.title: Welcome to Time & Payroll
welcome.text: View your worked hours, pending entries, and export timesheets for payroll processing.

hours.title: Viewing Hours
hours.text: See your total hours for the week and month. Pending entries awaiting approval are shown separately.

export.title: Exporting Timesheets
export.text: Download timesheets as CSV for payroll. Select the date range and format needed.

step1.text: Your weekly hours summary is displayed at the top.

step2.text: Pending time entries awaiting approval are listed here.

step3.text: Use the export button to download timesheets for payroll.

tooltip.weeklyHours: Total care hours logged this week
